roleset.name: not speak clearly

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Amateur linguists note here that Pursewarden, in Durrell's Alexandria Quartet, stammered when he spoke of his wife, which is hardly surprising in view of their disastrous relationship.
example.arg: when he spoke of his wife
which is hardly surprising in view of their disastrous relationship

example.name: with utterance
example.text: She stammered, ``You heard what he said about police?''
example.arg: ``You heard what he said about police?''

roleset.note: Not sure if arg2 will ever really appear.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'stammer' based on sentences in brown.
